BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO ACTIA_LOG_AUDIT_BODY_MEM_MST (STR_AUDIT_YEAR,NUM_AUDIT_BODY_MEMBER_DTL_ID,STR_AUDIT_BODY_CODE,GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM,GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO,GSTR_REMARKS,GNUM_SLNO,GNUM_ISVALID,GNUM_SEAT_ID,GDT_ENTRY_DATE,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,STR_MODIFY_SL_NO ) ( SELECT T.STR_AUDIT_YEAR,T.NUM_AUDIT_BODY_MEMBER_DTL_ID,T.STR_AUDIT_BODY_CODE,T.GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM, T.GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO,T.GSTR_REMARKS,T.GNUM_SLNO,T.GNUM_ISVALID,T.GNUM_SEAT_ID,T.GDT_ENTRY_DATE,T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,(select nvl(max(A.STR_MODIFY_SL_NO),0)+1 from ACTIA_LOG_AUDIT_BODY_MEM_MST A where A.NUM_AUDIT_BODY_MEMBER_DTL_ID=T.NUM_AUDIT_BODY_MEMBER_DTL_ID and A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE ) FROM ACTIA_AUDIT_BODY_MEM_MST T WHERE T.NUM_AUDIT_BODY_MEMBER_DTL_ID=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?)

INSERT INTO ACTIA_LOG_AUDIT_BODY_MEM_DTL (NUM_AUDIT_BODY_MEMBER_DTL_ID,STR_MEMBER_SLNO,STR_MEMBER_CODE,STR_MEMBER_DESIG_CODE,STR_MEMBER_DEPT_CODE,STR_EMP_CONTACT_NO,GNUM_ISVALID,GNUM_SEAT_ID,GDT_ENTRY_DATE,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,STR_MODIFY_SL_NO) ( SELECT T.NUM_AUDIT_BODY_MEMBER_DTL_ID, T.STR_MEMBER_SLNO,T.STR_MEMBER_CODE,T.STR_MEMBER_DESIG_CODE,T.STR_MEMBER_DEPT_CODE,T.STR_EMP_CONTACT_NO, T.GNUM_ISVALID, T.GNUM_SEAT_ID, T.GDT_ENTRY_DATE, T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE, T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID, T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE, ( select nvl(max(A.STR_MODIFY_SL_NO),0)+1 from ACTIA_LOG_AUDIT_BODY_MEM_DTL A where A.NUM_AUDIT_BODY_MEMBER_DTL_ID=T.NUM_AUDIT_BODY_MEMBER_DTL_ID and A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE ) FROM ACTIA_AUDIT_BODY_MEM_DTL T WHERE T.NUM_AUDIT_BODY_MEMBER_DTL_ID=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? )
DELETE FROM ACTIA_AUDIT_BODY_MEM_DTL T WHERE T.NUM_AUDIT_BODY_MEMBER_DTL_ID=? and t.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

UPDATE ACTIA_AUDIT_BODY_MEM_MST T SET T.GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM=TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY'),T.GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO=TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY'),T.GSTR_REMARKS=?,T.GDT_ENTRY_DATE=?,T.GNUM_ISVALID=?,T.GNUM_SEAT_ID=?,T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.NUM_AUDIT_BODY_MEMBER_DTL_ID=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
